abstract: Synthetic C.D.O.’s can help bolster a bank’s balance sheet — but not in a crisis.
snippet: Synthetic C.D.O.’s can help bolster a bank’s balance sheet — but not in a crisis.
lead_paragraph: 3:08 p.m. | Updated The bailout of Ireland arrived hand in hand with a panicky pullout of bank deposits, providing yet more proof of how hard it is for financial institutions to brace themselves against panics and crises.

headline.main: The Little Irelands of Structured Finance
